tagline: A weekly briefing on Prince Edward Island life, politics, and community.
description: Browse 79 archived issues of Island Edition—Andrew Chisholm’s weekly newsletter covering local stories, civic conversations, and island culture with a devoted audience.

author.name: Andrew Chisholm
author.bio: Writer and curator of the Island Edition newsletter from 2022 through November 2023.

timeline.sunset_reason: The weekly publication concluded in late 2023 to explore new storytelling formats while keeping the archive available for readers.
